Class NormalRecalcControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme.scene.control.AbstractControl

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jme.export.Savable, com.jme.scene.control.Control, com.jme.util.clone.JmeCloneable, java.lang.Cloneable
    public class NormalRecalcControl
extends com.jme.scene.control.AbstractControl
    Handles the normal vector updates when the terrain changes heights.
    Author:
    bowens
